name: meddler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who tries to change or have an influence on things that are not their responsibility: Critics of the war are hypocritical meddlers. He is a troublemaker, an unwelcome meddler. See
meddle
More examplesFewer examplesThe programme dismissed its critics as political meddlers.In the army's eyes, he and the other volunteers are unwanted meddlers.They're nothing but a bunch of meddlers, if you ask me.
